item.title: Project VII: Time series analysis project
item.description: Time series analysis is basically analyzing the data to find some pattern or trend over a certain period of time. After successfully analyzing the data, you have to forecast future trends/patterns. The nature of time series analysis is more identical to regression analysis, but here the data is time-dependent. In regression, it is assumed that the variables must be independent of each other. So, mere regression analysis can not be applied to time series data.
